issue.title: FixPart.* - Broken (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.52.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://fixpart.at/ https://fixpart.be/ https://fixpart.ch/ https://fixpart.co.uk/ https://fixpart.cz/ https://fixpart.de/ https://fixpart.es/ https://fixpart.fi/ https://fixpart.fr/ https://fixpart.hu/ https://fixpart.ie/ https://fixpart.it/ https://fixpart.lu/ https://fixpart.nl/ https://fixpart.no/ https://fixpart.ro/ https://fixpart.se/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://fixpart.at/
https://fixpart.be/
https://fixpart.ch/
https://fixpart.co.uk/
https://fixpart.cz/
https://fixpart.de/
https://fixpart.es/
https://fixpart.fi/
https://fixpart.fr/
https://fixpart.hu/
https://fixpart.ie/
https://fixpart.it/
https://fixpart.lu/
https://fixpart.nl/
https://fixpart.no/
https://fixpart.ro/
https://fixpart.se/
```
### Issue:
Modal overlay and empty/unclickable popup, due to a partially blocked cookie consent!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
`##.cookiebar:not(body)`

### Possible fix:
`fixpart.*##.fp-cookie-modal`

### Other problem filters:
* **EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/17478/
`##.cookiebar:not(body):not(html)`

* **Frellwit's Swedish Filter**
`##div.cookiebar`

* **I don't care about cookies** _(NOTIFIED)_
`~spilger.de##.cookiebar:not(body):not(html):not(button):not(#page):not(.content-section)`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v118.0.1-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.52.2

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

I haven't checked mtv.fi though, so it's possible that it's named differently there.

comment.body:
@lassekongo83 

I see no difference between these filters:

`mtv.fi##+js(xml-prune, MediaFiles, , videoplaza.tv/proxy/distributor)`
`mtv.fi##+js(xml-prune, MediaFile, , fi-mtv3.videoplaza.tv/proxy/distributor)`

It seems that ads work differently - in some programs (movies, longer shows) it's more common for them to slip through...

I updated filters again:

https://github.com/finnish-easylist-addition/finnish-easylist-addition/commit/50fe2f991f7fdd1a15dd66066cd5b23a4ee7b07c

With the updated set above, seems to work fine. Need feedback from other users as well.

These filters helped to deal with slipping through ads at the beginning of the video:
```
mtv.fi##.avod-web-player-csai:remove()
||cloudfront.net/creatives/assets/*.mp4$media,redirect=noop-0.1s.mp3,domain=mtv.fi
```

Maybe they work for tv4play as well?

issue.title: cboard.net

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body: I think that they will neutralize them quickly.
